name: Robot War Simulation
description:
Are you ready for some Robot war in the world of mech? Then, bring your legion to the battle field and start fighting battle between the robots of the future. These robots are from the future and are ready to conquer the world on the battleground.

A multiplayer game of awesome robots ready to destroy the territory of the enemy robot. Use war machines to help fight the battle and capture enemy robots fairly fighting with them on the battleground.

A robot fighting game where you use war machines and airstrike the gunshots and missiles on the territorial grounds of the enemy that revolves around you. Dominate your kingdom and destroy the battle robot. Defend your territory and armor it with the fair legion that will fight for their territorial grounds and defend and guard it with their life.

Mech Robot Iron Hero Wars Game Features:

• Multiplayer game with epic battle robots.
• 3D graphics in the robot fighting games.
• Robot upgrading features
• Various dangerous weapons available in the mech game.
• Target based game play with realistic sound track.
• Three Amazing HD environments of the battle grounds in the snow, dessert and city.
• Multiple weapons to be controlled on screen including missiles, gunshots and war machines.
• More than 30 levels in the robot fighting game.
• Every robot has a spectacular different super power to defend their territory and destroy enemy.
• Earn rewards of coins to purchase more competitive weapons for the war.
• Difficult levels full of thrill and action.
• Enemy counter on the screen.
• 12 different types of enemy robots to fight the battle with different multiple powers to conquer.

How to play:
• Start the game with war robot selection from 5 furious robots.
• Select the scene where you want to fight on the battleground.
• Start the battle game with fighting with the unfair war robots ready to destroy your
land.
• Use controls as joystick to move around and shoot at the rival robot according to the
attack.
• Press the fire button from 3 different types of guns.
• Use the jump key to avoid the enemy attack.
• Kill the enemy to earn coins.
• Make sure your health bar doesn’t end you have to finish the enemy’s health bar to kill
the battle robot.
• Follow the navigation or map to locate the territory of the battle robot.
• Use the career mode for some war robot fights and free mode to practice your moves
and awesome titan techniques.

The Mech robot Iron Hero Wars is an excellent multiplayer game for robot fighters and titans. You will have the Flake Gun, Missile and Laser gun which will be available with powerful war robot legion.
